mapper.insert: insert into zh_payables_info ( contract_id, freight_price, pre_pay, oil_pay, oil_card_no, exception_total, total, created_by, created_time )values ( #{contractId}, #{freightPrice}, #{prePay}, #{oilPay}, #{oilCardNo}, #{exceptionTotal}, #{total}, #{createdBy}, now() )
mapper.update: update zh_payables_info set contract_id=#{contractId}, freight_price=#{freightPrice}, pre_pay=#{prePay}, oil_pay=#{oilPay}, oil_card_no=#{oilCardNo}, exception_total=#{exceptionTotal}, total=#{total}, created_by=#{createdBy}, created_time=#{createdTime} where contract_id=#{contractId}

update zh_payables_info
contract_id=#{contractId},
freight_price=#{freightPrice},
pre_pay=#{prePay},
oil_pay=#{oilPay},
oil_card_no=#{oilCardNo},
exception_total=#{exceptionTotal},
total=#{total},
created_by=#{createdBy},
created_time=#{createdTime}
where contract_id=#{contractId}
mapper.select: select contract_id, freight_price, pre_pay, oil_pay, oil_card_no, exception_total, total, created_by, created_time from zh_payables_info where contract_id=#{contractId}
select contract_id, freight_price, pre_pay, oil_pay, oil_card_no, exception_total, total, created_by, created_time from zh_payables_info where contract_id=#{contractId}
